law.catch_line: An affidavit that sets forth the facts referred to in § 3-306 of this subtitle and any other facts ...

text.section: An affidavit that sets forth the facts referred to in § 3-306 of this subtitle and any other facts required by the Commissioner must be personally executed by the surplus lines broker or the originating insurance producer at the time the surplus lines insurance is placed.
The affidavit must be filed with the Commissioner on or before the 45th day after the last day of the calendar quarter in which the surplus lines insurance was placed.
